radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic steatosis with a fat fraction of 24%. A 4 mm calculus in the distal CBD with proximal bile duct dilatation (CBD measuring up to 13 mm). Smaller calculi noted in the mid to distal CBD. Mild intrahepatic bile duct dilatation. No focal suspicious hepatic lesions. No features of cholecystitis. Motion artifact degraded the study.
